import React from 'react' import './style.css' import { useHistory } from 'react-router-dom' import { getLoanStartDay } from '../../../utility/time' export default function LendPoolCard({openModal, item, size}) { const history = useHistory(); const poolStatus = { status_1 : 'Active', status_2 : 'Collecting', status_3 : 'Closed', status_4 : 'Defaulted', status_5 : 'Cancelled', status_6 : 'Terminated', } const viewMoreFunc = () => { history.push({pathname: '/lend-pool-details-collecting', state: { detail: item }}); } const isExpired = getLoanStartDay(item.loanStartTime) === 0 return (

{item.pool_status === poolStatus.status_1 ?
